notesStmt.note: Caption title: [Hebrew] Old Jacob's altar newly repaired, or, The saint's triangle of dangers, deliverances and duties.
Running title: The saints triangle of dangers, deliverances and duties.
Published in 1659 with titles: The saints dangers, deliverances, and duties personall, and nationall, and [Hebrew] Old Jacob's altar newly repaired, or The saint's triangle...
Reproduction of original in: Lambeth Palace Library (London, England)
